page.title: 07Children's Games
page.content: A Skipping Rhyme. Teddy Bear, Teddy Bear turn around, Teddy Bear, Teddy Bear touch the ground. Teddy Bear, Teddy Bear spell goodnight Teddy Bear, Teddy Bear switch off the light. Teddy Bear, Teddy Bear say your prayers, Teddy Bear, Teddy Bear get into bed and sleep, sleep, sleep, sleep. A Skipping game for three children. Two turn the rope, one each end, whilst the third child skips. Actions by skipper as she skips: Line 1 turn around; Line 2 touch the ground; Line 3 spell out word G.O.O.DNIGHT. Line 4 raise hand to switch off light; Line 5 close eyes and put hands in praying position as you skip. Line 6 repeat "sleep" until out.
